publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1272 Mr Brian Monteith: City of Stirling Ale-That the Parliament congratulates the Bridge of Allan Brewery on fighting off competition from 100 other United Kingdom breweries to secure Tesco's "Beer Challenge Winner" title and therefore securing a contract to supply all Tesco's UK stores with the speciality City of Stirling ale and believes a similar blind beer-tasting competition should be held for a Parliamentary ale that could be available in the new Parliament Building and on sale in the Parliament shop. Supported by: Murdo Fraser*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*

S2M-1272 Mr Brian Monteith: City of Stirling Ale-That the Parliament congratulates the Bridge of Allan Brewery on fighting off competition from 100 other United Kingdom breweries to secure Tesco's "Beer Challenge Winner" title and therefore securing a contract to supply all Tesco's UK stores with the speciality City of Stirling ale and believes a similar blind beer-tasting competition should be held for a Parliamentary ale that could be available in the new Parliament Building and on sale in the Parliament shop. Supported by: Murdo Fraser, Mr Ted Brocklebank
S2M-1272 City of Stirling Ale (lodged on 5 May 2004) Alasdair Morgan*
